abstracts.cdata!:
The Financial Sector Technical
            Assistance Loan Project aims at assisting the Ecuadorian
            government to manage and confront the deep financial sector
            crisis faced by the country, and strengthening the
            regulatory framework and supervisory capacity of the
            authorities in order to foster the long term soundness and
            efficiency of the banking system. The project consists of
            four components. 1) Strengthening of deposit insurance
            agency will assist in the preparation and regular updating
            of a coherent banking and corporate sector strategy; the
            modernization of legal framework; a study to identify
            obstacles for the sale of assets; institutional
            strengthening; and upgrading of information technology. 2)
            Strengthening of superintendency of banks will finance
            strengthening of in-situ supervision; complementary audits;
            modernization of legal framework; etc. 3) Debt restructuring
            will finance preparation and implementation of a framework
            for corporate and household debt restructuring; elimination
            of obstacles to corporate and household debt restructuring;
            and development of program for debt restructuring of small
            and medium enterprises. 4) The last component will finance
            the project coordination unit and provide training to staff.
